channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3902] MyAccount // HTML-Fail
item.description:
Dies soll unbedingt ins letze Deployment, da sonst die neue Funktion "Order-History" seitens sevenval nicht deployed werden kann.

Sevenval:
auf der MyAccount Seite gibt es ungültiges HTM auf der MyAccount Seite:

In der Navigation links ist ein Link bereits inline geschlossen, obwohl er eigentlich noch Inhalt hat.
Der Browser gleicht diesen Fehler automatisch aus, aber für den Parser existiert der Inhalt nicht.

Fehlerzeile im HTML:
<a class="accordion-item-title" href="#Settings" /><i class="icon-indicator"></i>Einstellungen</a>

Könntet Ihr das bitte möglichst schnell beheben lassen, dammit wir das korrekt parsen können.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3874] Optivo Content-Interface // Not returning values
item.description:
Content-Interface does not return any values.
Related to: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3588

comments.comment:
05 May 2014 12:05:15 ERROR [hybrisHTTP7] [10.191.17.10] [OptivoInterfaceController]
java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.ProductPageController.populateOpenGraphInformation(ProductPageController.java:467)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.OptivoInterfaceController.populateProductDetailForDisplay(OptivoInterfaceController.java:160)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.OptivoInterfaceController.get(OptivoInterfaceController.java:89)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3864] Missing preview images in Hybris
item.description:
The previews of the imges (thumbnails) in the HMC and the CMS Cockpit are broken because of the URL:

Broken:
http://hybris.datwyler.biz/medias/sys_master/h29/h29/8852272873502/schurter_mdf_ch_1418_LP1.png?mime=image%2Fpng&realname=schurter_mdf_ch_1418_LP1.png&cimgnr=0TXcM

Correct:
http://10.191.20.140:9001/medias/sys_master/h29/h29/8852272873502/schurter_mdf_ch_1418_LP1.png?mime=image%2Fpng&realname=schurter_mdf_ch_1418_LP1.png&cimgnr=0TXcM

comments.comment:
fixed apache config

  • deployed to QA @ HP for testing.
  • will be in next deployment for production

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3858] B2E-Orders // First- & Lastname missing
item.description: On all b2e-orders the first-/lastname is missing. See attached Screenshot of the Movex-order@hmc and the screenshot form Movex itself. The attached Table defines which values should be present in which condition.

attachment.name: 2014-05-02 13_26_47-Explorer_ Rafael Burlet@hybris.datwyler.biz_master_ Movex Bestellung - hybris Ma.png
attachment.author: rburlet

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3845] Optimize customer import
item.description:
Currently many of the customer updates fails, because we do not know the customer. This happens because Movex sends all customers and is not able to make a difference between shop customers and others.
In that case we improve the import that we make a check if we know this customer before we import it.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3837] Manufacturer import fails due to too long repair information
item.description: Since 18.04.2014 some manufacturers have significantly more content for "Support/Repair Info". The field in the DB allows to persist 255 chars only - which is not enough anymore.
item.summary: Manufacturer import fails due to too long repair information

comments.comment: Data type in DB changed from VARCHAR(255) to CLOB.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3829] No express delivery methode for "Streckenartikel"
item.description:
Express delivery should not be allowed on "Streckenartikel".
The Movex team will add the following flag in IF-63:

express delivered allowed = true --> normal product
express delivered allowed = false --> Streckenartikel

comments.comment: Yes, that's fine. Please add the new attribute to the most right position (end). This will ensure backward compatibility and Raphael can add the new field independently of the deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3787] Cart - Recalculate price problem with some products
item.description:
Open the following product page details, add the product to the cart. Then go to the cart and try to modify the quantity. Click on the "Recalculate" button. The "Single List Price" and the "Subtotal" disappears.

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Galaxy-S-Duos-S7562-4-GB-black-Samsung-GT-S7562/p/11056387

Note: if you refresh the whole page, the prices will appear again.
item.summary: Cart - Recalculate price problem with some products

comments.comment: Yes the error still occurs. I noticed that this error occurs only for products with promotion. In the json response, we have the "baseListPrice" and the "totalListPrice" empty.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3766] ERROR / [AbstractCategoryElementConverter] / Could not resolve pim category type for [01_Active_components_web_toc]
item.description: Object Types die im XML mitgesendet werden aber im Y nicht als Class-Node definiert sind
item.summary: ERROR / [AbstractCategoryElementConverter] / Could not resolve pim category type for [01_Active_components_web_toc]

comments.comment: Hallo Adi, bitte wie vereinbart, die Log so anpassen, dass die Object-Type-Info (ID) mitausgegeben wird.

@Önder: UserTypeID wird ab der Version v1.1.13 im Log ausgewiesen.
Zudem habe ich für die Root Kategorie einen Typen definiert (L0D e-Shop), sodass für dies Kategorie kein Fehler mehr ausgegeben wird.
Die folgenden Kategorien werden in hybris nicht benötigt. Kannst du diese im Export unterdrücken?

Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [toc_images_web_elfa]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [01_Active_components_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [02_Passive_components_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [03_Electromechanical_components_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [04_Embedded_wireless_education_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [05_Batteries_transformers_power_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [06_Test_measuring_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [07_Automation_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [Facility_management_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [08_Installation_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [09_Light_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [10_tools_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IT_accessorie_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [11_Workplace_web_toc]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_images]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_cat]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_alphabetic]
Could not resolve pim category type [Datasheet] for [IMG_mobile_0-4]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_5-9]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_cl]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_dat]
Could not resolve pim category type [ClassFolder] for [IMG_mobile_bul]

Sollte das nicht möglich sein, kann ich auch noch einen Typ "ClassFolder" einführen.
Der Typ "Datasheet" für "IMG_mobile_0-4" ist ziemlich sicher falsch im Stibo.

Hallo Adi,

folgendes habe ich im PIM korrigiert:
Der Typ "Datasheet" für "IMG_mobile_0-4" ist ziemlich sicher falsch im Stibo.

Ja, bitte erstelle einen Typ "ClassFolder". Ich kann es im Stibo nicht unterdrücken.

Danke, Önder
Fixed by adding a category "ClassFolder". Error will not occur in version v1.1.16 anymore.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3591] WA-implementation of 8-digit ID of purchased products
item.description:
As pre-discusssed there is a need to implement an additional Webtrekk-parameter. Please compare the attached Webtrekk-Spec in this regard.

Bests, Mark
item.summary: WA-implementation of 8-digit ID of purchased products

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3876] Alternative text is missing at the graphical symbols
item.description:
The alternative text is missing for the graphical symbols. that was a complain in every 5th mail i received, when i became feedback from our customer.

so please fill it up for every country.

Attachement: 1 --> no text
Attachement: 2 --> how it has to be
item.summary: Alternative text is missing at the graphical symbols
